Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- 2nd Justice Court
Plantation Estates Subdivision Special District -- $500 Parcel Fee - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Plantation Estates Subdivision Special District Proposition
(Annual Security Enhancement Tax)
Race.FullText: Shall Plantation Estates Subdivision Special District, Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to levy and collect an annual security enhancement tax, beginning in the year 2021, in the amount of $500 in each of the years 2021 to 2024, inclusive; in the amount of $575 in each of the years 2025 to 2028, inclusive; and in the amount of $625 in each of the years 2029 to 2030, inclusive, against each parcel of improved immovable property listed and/or assessed on the tax rolls of the Parish of Jefferson and located in the District, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $208,000, for the purpose of purchasing, acquiring, constructing and improving, or leasing, maintaining and operating machinery and equipment and other facilities to be used, and paying other expenses incurred and/or contracting for services to be rendered in connection with providing security enhancement services for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 3 -- 20 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 3 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax not to exceed twenty (20) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $3,636,742, for the purposes of acquiring, constructing, improving, providing, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment?
